name: The Bible is the word of god

nodes.label: Bible is Word of God
nodes.desc: This is a common belief among some Christians

nodes.label: The Bible says it is the word of God
nodes.desc: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness, so that the man of God may be thoroughly equipped for every good work‚Äù (2 Timothy 3:15-17).

nodes.label: The Bible is Inerrant
nodes.desc: As the Word of God, the Bible cannot contain falsehoods.
